de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics
Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
  de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.Sprite

public class Sprite
extends Object

A sprite is an object that contains the images for an Agent simulation, as he faces each possible direction.

Author:
Miquel Martin
